references.paper_title: Stochastic convex optimization with bandit feedback
references.reason: This paper provides foundational work on the problem of stochastic zeroth-order optimization with convex functions and establishes a benchmark for the sample complexity

references.paper_title: Exploiting higher order smoothness in derivative-free optimization and continuous bandits
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the benefits of higher-order smoothness assumptions on improving sample complexity, influencing the approach and analysis of the current paper

references.paper_title: Improved exploiting higher order smoothness in derivative-free optimization and continuous bandit
references.reason: This work builds on the previous work by Akhavan et al. and provides further insights on the use of higher-order smoothness

references.paper_title: Improved regret for zeroth-order stochastic convex bandits
references.reason: This paper offers insights into the optimal sample complexity for zeroth-order bandit convex optimization, providing a comparative analysis for the current study
